sentences.sContent: The sugared vinegar is refined from the sugarcane and pine.
sentences.sContent_eng: The sugared vinegar is refined from the sugarcane and pine.
sentences.sCn: 加糖的醋是从甘蔗和松木中精炼出来的。

sentences.sContent: There are vast fields of sugarcane in Queensland, Australia.
sentences.sContent_eng: There are vast fields of sugarcane in Queensland, Australia.
sentences.sCn: 在澳大利亚昆士兰州有大片甘蔗田。

sentences.sContent: Plant waxes include carnauba wax candelilla wax and sugarcane wax used in polishes. About90% of the waxes in commerce are recovered by dewaxing petroleum.
sentences.sContent_eng: Plant waxes include carnauba wax candelilla wax and sugarcane wax used in polishes. About90% of the waxes in commerce are recovered by dewaxing petroleum.
sentences.sCn: 植物蜡主要是巴西棕榈蜡，小烛树蜡和甘蔗蜡都用作擦亮剂。工业用蜡中约有90%是由石油中回收的。

remMethod.val: sugar(糖) + cane(藤条， 茎) → 糖条 → 甘蔗

trans.tranOther: a tall tropical plant from whose stems sugar is obtained
